name: Lightswitch Assassin Prototype
description:
Works best on full screen.

Not sure why, but the lighting is funky when converted to html. My final game will definitely be a download unless I can work around this.

Summary - A stealth based game where you must turn off all the lights and kill the enemies to progress through levels.

Stand in the light and you will be discovered by the enemies, this will result in a level restart. Gems show the number of times you can turn off the lights without being discovered. Kill all the enemies in each level to progress.

Controls - Up, down, left, right arrows or W, A, S, D to move. Shift to kill frogs, space to turn off lights.
